system.effect: The attack smashes into the arm, sending currents of energy crackling down to the fingers and up to the shoulder. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue, and that arm is Useless for [[1d5]] rounds.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Arm (Severity 2)

The attack smashes into the arm, sending currents of energy crackling down to the fingers and up to the shoulder. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue, and that arm is Useless for [[1d5]] rounds.
